types.html:
copie cachée f (usually uncountable, plural copies cachées)

  1. (Internet) blind carbon copy (copy of an email message that is sent to a person (often one of many) other than the primary recipient without the express knowledge of the other recipients)
    Synonym: copie carbone invisible
    mettre quelqu'un en copie cachée ― to BCC someone
trans: blind carbon copy  other than the primary recipient without the express knowledge of the other recipients)

title: copie cachée
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /kɔ.pi ka.ʃe/
